short.am,ar,bg,bn,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,fa,fi,f: Launch IITC for Ingress Intel with ease.
short.ca: Inicia IITC per Ingress Intel amb facilitat.
short.cs: Zjednodušte si používání IITC pro Ingress Intel.
short.da: Start IITC for Ingress med lethed.
short.de: IITC für Ingress mit Leichtigkeit starten.
short.el: Ξεκινήστε το IITC για τον χάρτη Ingress Intel με ευκολία.
short.es: Inicio fácil de IITC Ingress Intel.
short.es_419: Inicie IITC para Ingress Intel con facilidad.
short.he: השק את אייאייטיסי לאינגרס אינטל בקלות.
short.id: Luncurkan IITC untuk Ingress Intel dengan mudah.
short.it: Lancia IITC per la Intel di Ingress con facilità.
short.ja: Ingressインテルマップ用IITCを簡単に起動します。
short.ko: Ingress Intel을 좀 더 편리하게 사용하기 위해 IITC를 실행하세요.
short.nl: Eenvoudig opstarten van IITC voor Ingress Intel.
short.pl: Uprość korzystanie z IITC dla Ingress Intel.
short.pt_BR: Inicie o IITC para o mapa Intel do Ingress com facilidade.
short.pt_PT: Inicie o IITC para o mapa Ingress Intel com facilidade.
short.ru: Запуск IITC для Ingress в один клик.
short.sl: Zaženite IITC za Intel Ingress z lahkoto.
short.sv: Starta IITC för Ingress Intel enkelt.
short.th: เปิดใช้งาน IITC สำหรับ Ingress Intel อย่างง่ายดาย
short.tr: Ingress Intel için IITC'yi kolaylıkla başlatın.
short.uk: Запускай Ingress Intel с IITC в один клік.
short.zh_CN: 从 Ingress Intel 地图快速启动IITC。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,da,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,et,f:
Intel map of Ingress game with IITC-CE ( iitc.app ) in your browser.

WHAT IS IT AND WHAT DOES IT DO?

Basically, Intel Ingress Total Conversion scripts allows to you to run Intel map of Ingress game with additional useful feature an a better overall experience. It consumes less resources than unmodified Intel, loads and run faster. It is also powered with useful custom plugins, which provide additional information.

WHY THIS EXTENSION IS BETTER

This extensions launch Intel Ingress Total Conversion in few seconds after installation. Installing plugins is easier than ever.

ITS TOTALLY SAFE!

Theoretically, you violates ToS, but as you totally relies on intel.ingress.com API, you use just Intel site. All other modifications (UI, Plugin features, etc.) modifies only your browser view! It's like adblock activated in your browser.

GitHub repository: https://github.com/IITC-CE/IITC-Button/
